mapper.select: select * from auction where auctioneer_no = #{auctioneerNo} and auction_no = (select max(auction_no) from auction)

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.*, count(*) over() auction_count from ( select C.auction_no, C.auction_title, C.auction_opening_bid, C.auction_closed_time, min(D.photo_attachment_no) photo_attachment_no, max(E.bidding_price) bidding_price
, G.like_count
from (select * from gps_address where
member_no = ${memberNo}
gps_no = (select min(gps_no) from gps_address where member_no = #{memberNo})
gps_no = (select max(gps_no) from gps_address where member_no = #{memberNo})
) A, auction C join photo D on C.auction_no = D.photo_auction_no left join bidding E on C.auction_no = E.auction_no left join successful_bid F on C.auction_no = F.auction_no
left join (select A.auctioneer_no, count(A.auctioneer_no) like_count from auction A join member_rating B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no join rating C on B.rating_item_no = C.rating_item_no where C.rating_sort_no = 1 group by A.auctioneer_no) G on C.auctioneer_no = G.auctioneer_no
where C.auction_private = 0 and F.auction_no is null and C.auction_closed_time > sysdate
and (instr(C.auction_title, '${keyword}') > 0 or instr(C.auction_content, '${keyword}') > 0)
and instr(C.auction_title, '${keyword}') > 0
and instr(C.auction_content, '${keyword}') > 0
and C.category_no = ${categoryNo}
and (distance(A.gps_latitude, A.gps_longitude, C.auction_latitude1, C.auction_longitude1) <= (A.gps_circle + C.auction_circle1) or distance(A.gps_latitude, A.gps_longitude, C.auction_latitude2, C.auction_longitude2) <= (A.gps_circle + C.auction_circle2)) group by C.auction_no, C.auction_title, C.auction_opening_bid, C.auction_closed_time
, G.like_count
order by
nvl(bidding_price, C.auction_opening_bid) desc,
nvl(bidding_price, C.auction_opening_bid) asc,
C.auction_closed_time asc,
G.like_count desc nulls last,
C.auction_no desc ) TMP ) where rn between ${begin} and ${end}

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( select A.auction_no, A.auction_title, A.auction_closed_time, min(B.photo_attachment_no) photo_attachment_no, max(C.bidding_price) bidding_price ,D.my_bidding_price, D.my_bidding_no from auction A join photo B on A.auction_no = B.photo_auction_no left join bidding C on A.auction_no = C.auction_no join (select auction_no, max(bidding_price) my_bidding_price, min(bidding_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc) my_bidding_no from bidding where bidder_no = #{bidderNo} group by auction_no) D on A.auction_no = D.auction_no left join successful_bid E on A.auction_no = E.auction_no where A.auction_private = 0 and E.auction_no is null and A.auction_closed_time > sysdate group by A.auction_no, A.auction_title, A.auction_closed_time, D.my_bidding_price, D.my_bidding_no order by D.my_bidding_no desc ) TMP ) where rn between 1 and 4

select B.bidding_count, B.max_bidding_price, D.category_name, D.category_no, A.auction_no, A.auctioneer_no, A.auction_title, A.auction_content, A.auction_closed_time, A.auction_opening_bid, A.auction_closing_bid, A.auction_bid_unit, A.auction_status
,C.my_bidding_price ,case when B.max_bidding_price = C.my_bidding_price and B.min_bidding_no = C.my_bidding_no then '1' else '0' end as top_bidder
from auction A left join (select auction_no, count(*) bidding_count, max(bidding_price) max_bidding_price, min(bidding_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc) min_bidding_no from bidding group by auction_no) B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no
left join (select auction_no, max(bidding_price) my_bidding_price, min(bidding_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc) my_bidding_no from bidding where bidder_no = #{bidderNo} group by auction_no) C on A.auction_no = C.auction_no
join category D on A.category_no = D.category_no where A.auction_no = #{auctionNo} group by B.bidding_count, B.max_bidding_price, B.min_bidding_no, D.category_name, D.category_no, A.auction_no, A.auctioneer_no, A.auction_title, A.auction_content, A.auction_closed_time, A.auction_opening_bid, A.auction_closing_bid, A.auction_bid_unit, A.auction_status
,C.my_bidding_price, C.my_bidding_no

select A.auctioneer_no, A.dislike_count, B.like_count, D.member_nick, D.attachment_no, D.member_preference, D.member_logintime, D.member_red_count from (select A.auctioneer_no, count(C.rating_sort_no) dislike_count from auction A left join member_rating B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no left outer join (select * from rating where rating_sort_no = 0) C on B.rating_item_no = C.rating_item_no where A.auctioneer_no = ${auctioneerNo} group by A.auctioneer_no ) A left join (select A.auctioneer_no, count(C.rating_sort_no) like_count from auction A left join member_rating B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no left outer join (select * from rating where rating_sort_no = 1) C on B.rating_item_no = C.rating_item_no where A.auctioneer_no = ${auctioneerNo} group by A.auctioneer_no ) B on A.auctioneer_no = B.auctioneer_no join member D on A.auctioneer_no = D.member_no

select A.auction_no, B.succ_bidder_no, B.succ_final_bid, B.succ_auction_count from auction A join (select auction_no, count(*) succ_auction_count, max(bidding_price) succ_final_bid, min(bidding_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc), min(bidder_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc) succ_bidder_no from bidding group by auction_no) B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no left join successful_bid C on A.auction_no = C.auction_no where A.auction_closed_time <= #{auctionClosedTime} and C.auction_no is null and A.auction_private = 0

select A.auction_no, B.succ_bidder_no, B.succ_final_bid, B.succ_auction_count from auction A join (select auction_no, count(*) succ_auction_count, max(bidding_price) succ_final_bid, min(bidding_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc), min(bidder_no) keep(dense_rank first order by bidding_price desc) succ_bidder_no from bidding group by auction_no) B on A.auction_no = B.auction_no left join successful_bid C on A.auction_no = C.auction_no where A.auction_no = ${auctionNo}
select auction_private from auction where auction_no = ${auctionNo}

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.*, count(*) over() auction_count, sum(case when TMP.succ_auctioneer_approve is not null and TMP.succ_bidder_approve is not null then TMP.succ_final_bid end) over() total_point from ( select A.auction_upload_time, A.category_no, B.category_name, A.auction_title, A.auction_no, A.auction_process, C.succ_bid_no, C.succ_bid_status, C.succ_auctioneer_approve, C.succ_bidder_approve, C.succ_final_bid, D.chatroom_no, E.rating_no, case when A.auction_closed_time > sysdate then '진행 중' else '마감' end as auction_finish from auction A join category B on A.category_no = B.category_no left join successful_bid C on A.auction_no = C.auction_no left join chatroom D on A.auction_no = D.auction_no left join member_rating E on A.auction_no = E.auction_no where A.auctioneer_no = ${auctioneerNo}
and instr(A.auction_title, '${keyword}') > 0
and A.category_no = ${categoryNo}
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status is null and A.auction_closed_time > sysdate
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status is null and A.auction_closed_time <= sysdate
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status = 0
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status = 1 and (C.succ_auctioneer_approve is null or C.succ_bidder_approve is null)
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status = 1 and C.succ_auctioneer_approve is not null and C.succ_bidder_approve is not null and E.rating_no is null
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status = 1 and E.rating_no is not null
and A.auction_process = 0 and C.succ_bid_status = 2
and A.auction_process = 1
and A.auction_process = 2
order by
A.auction_no desc
A.auction_no asc
C.succ_final_bid desc nulls last
) TMP ) where rn between #{begin} and #{end}

select count(*) from auction A inner join member M on A.auctioneer_no = M.member_no inner join category C on A.category_no = C.category_no
where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0

select A.*, M.member_nick, C.category_name, (select min(photo_attachment_no) from photo P where A.auction_no = P.photo_auction_no) "photo_attachment_no", (select max(bidding_price) from bidding B where A.auction_no = B.auction_no) "max_bidding_price" from auction A inner join member M on A.auctioneer_no = M.member_no inner join category C on A.category_no = C.category_no where auction_no = #{auctionNo}
mapper.update: update auction set auction_private = 0 where auction_no = #{auctionNo} and auction_private = 1
update auction set auction_private = 1 where auction_no = #{auctionNo} and auction_private = 0
